agents

Class ParetoFrontierPlus

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.ParetoFrontierPlus

  • public class ParetoFrontierPlus
extends java.lang.Object
    Like ParetoFrontier, but with extra functionality. This version loads the frontier by itself using the given utility spaces.

    notes

    We may decide to move these functions into ParetoFrontier. When a utility space changes, you currently just need to make a new ParetoFrontierPlus from scratch using the constructor. This is because we can not listen to changes in AdditiveUtilitySpaces
    Author:
    W.Pasman 3sep14

        Project a utility onto a pareto frontier point
        Parameters:
        otherUtil - the utility that the projected point should be close to.
        Returns:

      • getBidWithMinimumUtility

        public BidPoint getBidWithMinimumUtility(double utility)
        get the bid on the pareto that has at least the given utility for me (as close as possible to the target)
        Parameters:
        utility - target utility for me.
        Returns:
        bid that is nearest bid above or at target utility for me. May return null if no such bid.
